Title: The Teacher's Diary
Writer: Sopana Chaowwiwatkul, Supalerk Ningsanond, Nithiwat Tharatorn, Thodsapon Thiptinnakorn
Actors: Laila Boonyasak, Sukrit Wisetkaew, Sukollawat Kanarot, Chutima Teepanat
Plot: It follows the story of two lonely teachers, a male and a female. They were assigned at the same rural school but a year apart. The girl being assigned first, attempted to write her ...
